item.description:
Here is another great chance to help Chile recover from its devastating earthquake AND enjoy some wonderful music! This event features "Alturas Duo" - Andean instruments (Carlos Boltes & Scott Hill) - which produce and absolutely gorgeous sound. It should be a real treat to hear them live. Also performing are Crescendo Chorus and Vocal Ensemble (Christine Gevefrt) and Duo Les Inegales (Rodrigo Tarraza)...and other works!

Note**There is a $30.00 tax deductible donation requested at the door.***

Proceeds go to: http://www.chileusfou...
item.name: Â¡FUERZA CHILE!
